DOC.brief_summary: CRICS financial report for the first budget year of the study
DOC.brief_title: Vietnam Cryptococcal Retention in Care Study (CRICS) Federal Financial Report
DOC.detailed_description: Vietnam Cryptococcal Retention in Care Study (CRICS) federal financial report for the first budget year of the study
DOC.criteria: Aged ≥ 18 years Confirmed HIV infection using National Testing Algorithm CD4 ≤100 cells/μL Able to provide written informed consent History of prior CM Receipt of systemic antifungal medication for more than 4 consecutive weeks within the past 6 months Currently taking ART or history of ART for more than 4 weeks within the past year Known to be currently pregnant or planning to become pregnant during the study period
